project_descr: To develop a distinctive approach and accelerate the deployment of rural electrification utilizing renewable mini-grids

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the GEF PPG is to develop the project concept into a full project Clean Rural Electrification for African Countries. The GEF project aims to design scaling mechanisms for minigrids in several African countries, such that these can then be funded by the GEF-7 replenishment cycle. These mechanisms will include the accelerated deployment, demonstration and financing of low carbon technologies for electricity access.

project_title: clean rural electrification for african countries
